items.text: floated across the left-hander, this is a stylish drive to deep point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: skids a length ball back in from wide of the crease, Powell defends from the crease.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, no run

items.text: muscled! Not all that short, but he stood up and then played this short-arm jab past wide mid-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, FOUR runs

items.text: dabs this with an opened bat face to backward point.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, no run

items.text: pulled, but not in control. Mistimed to midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, no run

items.text: slower and fuller outside off, dabbed to cover from where there's a direct hit at the bowler's end. The ball ricochets towards wide long-off, so they get two more for the overthrow
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, 3 runs

items.text: punches this length delivery to cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run

items.text: shapes to cut, beaten by the skid. Was also too close for him to play the stroke
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run

items.text: eased down to long-on as he jogs the single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, 1 run

items.text: rocks back and punches to wide long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: touch short, worked across the line to deep square
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, 1 run

items.text: worked with the spin to midwicket
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: gets big on him as he aims to pull, got it high on the bat as well. Rolls towards short midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, no run

items.text: full delivery that tails in a hint, pushed to cover.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, no run

items.text: eased down to third man as they complete a single
items.postText: Yanthan: "Holder should bat either at 5 or 6...he is a much better batsman he must trust himself and take the responsibility from this fragile WI batting line up" -- Yay, your feedback that you posted for the 1000th time is now approved.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, 1 run

items.text: shows the full face of the bat as he defends this full delivery to mid-off.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, no run

items.text: whips this from a length to deep backward square leg, confusion in the running but they stick to just a single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: steered wide of backward point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Powell, 1 run

items.text: defended back to the bowler.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run

items.text: stops on him as this drifts in, jabbed back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run

items.text: fired full on the stumps, he lunges forward and blocks
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run

items.text: eased down to long-on as he got nice and close to the pitch of the delivery
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, 1 run

items.text: steps out and drills this down to long-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hetmyer, 1 run

items.text: defended back with the spin to the bowler.
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Powell, no run

items.text: slides off a length, he looks to work it square, deflected off the pad to fine leg.
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hetmyer, 1 leg bye
